definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

sentences.english: A few of us( A few of the students ) in our class can do a somersault.
sentences.chinese: 我們班裏只有幾個人會作側空翻。

sentences.english: The side somersault is a stunt in three circuits to bunch up the body.
sentences.chinese: 團身側空翻三週是一個高難度動作。
